survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Green Energy Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and awareness regarding workplace green energy initiatives, such as solar panels, energy-efficient lighting, and other sustainability efforts implemented by the organization.

questions.question_text: How aware are you of your workplace's green energy initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure awareness levels clearly.

script.question_text: How aware are you of your workplace's green energy initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following green energy initiatives are you aware of at your workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify which initiatives employees recognize.

script.question_text: Which of the following green energy initiatives are you aware of at your workplace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your workplace's efforts to promote green energy?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your workplace's efforts to promote green energy?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve workplace green energy initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve workplace green energy initiatives?

questions.question_text: Do you believe green energy initiatives positively impact your workplace experience?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge perceived impact.

script.question_text: Do you believe green energy initiatives positively impact your workplace experience?
